Name: Statuette of a man
Description: The statuette represents a striding man with his left leg put forward. The arms are attached by pegs; the left hand rests on the right shoulder in the posture of prayer, the lost right arm was probably lowered. The man has short-cropped hair and wears a long garment. The body is painted ochre, the garment is white, the hair and eyelids are black.
